#summary A tutorial to create Tesseract Engine 3.0.x .net wrapper.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

A tutorial to create Tesseract Engine 3.0.x .net wrapper.

= Details =

Below is a quick tutorial:

1.
Download *tesseractenginewrapper.h* and *tesseractenginewrapper.cpp* at *http://code.google.com/p/tesseractdotnet/source/browse/trunk/

2.
Add them to tesseract project (*http://code.google.com/p/tesseract-ocr/)

3.
Changed the project settings as belows:

Configuration Type: *Dynamic Library (.dll)*

Common Language Runtime Support: *Old Syntax (/clr:oldSyntax)*

Output File: *tesseractengine3.dll*

4.
After that, apply building the project.

Note: You can also find simple application at *http://code.google.com/p/tesseractdotnet/source/browse/trunk/TesseractBasedOCRAnalysis.sln
